document_data.name: Ogg
document_data.mainbody: '''Ogg''' was a [[hill giant]] who, together with [[Lob]], led an attack on [[Goldenfields]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Lob and Ogg always traveled together.
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], under the orders of chief [[Guh]], Lob and Ogg went in search of food for Guh. After wandering, they led a giant contingent to Goldenfields. However, they were defeated by some adventurers.
